trans-unit.source: Provides a set of static methods, attached properties, and events for determining and setting focus scopes and for setting the focused element within the scope.
trans-unit.target: Fornisce un set di metodi statici, le proprietà associate e gli eventi per determinare e impostare gli ambiti lo stato attivo e per impostare l'elemento all'interno dell'ambito.

trans-unit.source: In [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_wpf](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-wpf-md.md)] there are two concepts concerning focus: keyboard focus and logical focus.
trans-unit.target: In [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_wpf](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-wpf-md.md)] due concetti, lo stato attivo: tastiera e lo stato attivo logico.

trans-unit.source: Keyboard focus pertains to the element which is currently receiving keyboard input.
trans-unit.target: Lo stato attivo si riferisce all'elemento che riceve input da tastiera correntemente.

trans-unit.source: There can be only one element with keyboard focus.
trans-unit.target: Può esistere un solo elemento con stato attivo della tastiera.

trans-unit.source: This element with keyboard focus has <xref:System.Windows.IInputElement.IsKeyboardFocused%2A> set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: L'elemento con stato attivo della tastiera ha <xref:System.Windows.IInputElement.IsKeyboardFocused%2A>impostato su `true`.</xref:System.Windows.IInputElement.IsKeyboardFocused%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Input.Keyboard.FocusedElement%2A?displayProperty=fullName> returns the element with keyboard focus.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Input.Keyboard.FocusedElement%2A?displayProperty=fullName>Restituisce l'elemento con stato attivo della tastiera.</xref:System.Windows.Input.Keyboard.FocusedElement%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: Logical focus pertains to the <xref:System.Windows.Input.FocusManager.FocusedElement%2A?displayProperty=fullName> within a specific focus scope.
trans-unit.target: Lo stato attivo logico riguarda il <xref:System.Windows.Input.FocusManager.FocusedElement%2A?displayProperty=fullName>all'interno di un ambito specifico dello stato attivo.</xref:System.Windows.Input.FocusManager.FocusedElement%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: A focus scope is a container element that keeps track of the <xref:System.Windows.Input.FocusManager.FocusedElement%2A?displayProperty=fullName> within its scope.
trans-unit.target: Un ambito attivo è un elemento contenitore che tiene traccia del <xref:System.Windows.Input.FocusManager.FocusedElement%2A?displayProperty=fullName>all'interno dell'ambito.</xref:System.Windows.Input.FocusManager.FocusedElement%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: By default, the <xref:System.Windows.Window> class is a focus scope as are the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Menu>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu>, and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolBar> classes.
trans-unit.target: Per impostazione predefinita, la <xref:System.Windows.Window>classe è un ambito attivo, come il <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Menu>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu>, e <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolBar>classi.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolBar> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Menu> </xref:System.Windows.Window>

trans-unit.source: An element which is a focus scope has <xref:System.Windows.Input.FocusManager.IsFocusScope%2A> set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: È un elemento che è un ambito attivo <xref:System.Windows.Input.FocusManager.IsFocusScope%2A>impostato su `true`.</xref:System.Windows.Input.FocusManager.IsFocusScope%2A>

trans-unit.source: There can be multiple elements with logical focus, but there can only be one element with logical focus within a single focus scope.
trans-unit.target: Possono essere presenti più elementi con lo stato attivo logico, ma può esistere solo un elemento con lo stato attivo logico in un ambito singolo stato attivo.

trans-unit.source: An element with logical focus does not necessarily have keyboard focus, but an element with keyboard focus will have logical focus.
trans-unit.target: Un elemento con lo stato attivo logico non deve necessariamente lo stato attivo, ma un elemento con stato attivo della tastiera avrà lo stato attivo logico.

trans-unit.source: It is possible to define a focus scope within a focus scope.
trans-unit.target: È possibile definire un ambito attivo all'interno di un ambito attivo.

trans-unit.source: In this case, both the parent focus scope and the child focus scope can have a <xref:System.Windows.Input.FocusManager.FocusedElement%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: In questo caso, l'ambito lo stato attivo padre e ambito dello stato attivo figlio può avere un <xref:System.Windows.Input.FocusManager.FocusedElement%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Windows.Input.FocusManager.FocusedElement%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The following scenario illustrates how keyboard focus and logical focus change in a [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_wpf](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-wpf-md.md)] application that has a <xref:System.Windows.Window> with a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBox> and a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Menu> which has a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem>.
trans-unit.target: Lo scenario seguente illustra i cambiamenti di stato attivo della tastiera e lo stato attivo logico un [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_wpf](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-wpf-md.md)] applicazione che dispone di una <xref:System.Windows.Window>con una <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBox>e una <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Menu>che ha una <xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Menu> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBox> </xref:System.Windows.Window>

trans-unit.source: When keyboard focus changes from the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBox> to the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem>, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBox> losses keyboard focus but retains logical focus for the <xref:System.Windows.Window> focus scope.
trans-unit.target: Quando lo stato attivo passa dal <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBox>per il <xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBox>perde lo stato attivo della tastiera ma mantiene lo stato attivo logico per il <xref:System.Windows.Window>ambito dello stato attivo.</xref:System.Windows.Window> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBox> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBox>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem> obtains keyboard focus and obtains logical focus for the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Menu> focus scope.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem>Ottiene lo stato attivo e lo stato attivo logico per il <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Menu>ambito dello stato attivo.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Menu> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem>

trans-unit.source: When keyboard focus returns to the root <xref:System.Windows.Window>, the element in <xref:System.Windows.Window> focus scope with logical focus will obtain keyboard focus, which in this case is the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBox>.
trans-unit.target: Quando viene restituito lo stato attivo per la radice <xref:System.Windows.Window>l'elemento <xref:System.Windows.Window>nell'ambito dello stato attivo con lo stato attivo logico otterrà lo stato attivo, ovvero in questo caso <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBox>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBox> </xref:System.Windows.Window> </xref:System.Windows.Window>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBox> now has keyboard focus and logical focus.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBox>include ora lo stato attivo e lo stato attivo logico.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBox>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem> loses keyboard focus, but retains logical focus for the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Menu> focus scope.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem>perde lo stato attivo della tastiera, ma mantiene lo stato attivo logico per il <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Menu>ambito dello stato attivo.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Menu> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem>

trans-unit.source: The default value of <xref:System.Windows.Input.FocusManager.IsFocusScope%2A> on a <xref:System.Windows.Window>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Menu>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolBar>, and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu> is `true`.
trans-unit.target: Il valore predefinito di <xref:System.Windows.Input.FocusManager.IsFocusScope%2A>su un <xref:System.Windows.Window>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Menu>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolBar>, e <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu>è `true`.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolBar> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Menu> </xref:System.Windows.Window> </xref:System.Windows.Input.FocusManager.IsFocusScope%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information on focus, see the [Input Overview](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) and the [Focus Overview](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Per ulteriori informazioni sullo stato attivo, vedere il [Input Overview](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) e [Focus Overview](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: Adds a handler for the <xref:System.Windows.Input.FocusManager.GotFocus> attached event.
trans-unit.target: Aggiunge un gestore per il <xref:System.Windows.Input.FocusManager.GotFocus>evento associato.</xref:System.Windows.Input.FocusManager.GotFocus>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement"></xref> or <xref href="System.Windows.ContentElement"></xref> that listens to this event.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement"> </xref> o <xref href="System.Windows.ContentElement"> </xref> in ascolto su questo evento.

trans-unit.source: The event handler to be added.
trans-unit.target: Il gestore dell'evento da aggiungere.

trans-unit.source: Adds a handler for the <xref:System.Windows.Input.FocusManager.LostFocus> attached event.
trans-unit.target: Aggiunge un gestore per il <xref:System.Windows.Input.FocusManager.LostFocus>evento associato.</xref:System.Windows.Input.FocusManager.LostFocus>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement"></xref> or <xref href="System.Windows.ContentElement"></xref> that listens to this event.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement"> </xref> o <xref href="System.Windows.ContentElement"> </xref> in ascolto su questo evento.

trans-unit.source: The event handler to be added.
trans-unit.target: Il gestore dell'evento da aggiungere.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Input.FocusManager.FocusedElement*> attached property.
trans-unit.target: Identifica la <xref:System.Windows.Input.FocusManager.FocusedElement*>proprietà associata.</xref:System.Windows.Input.FocusManager.FocusedElement*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Da aggiungere.

trans-unit.source: Gets the element with logical focus within the specified focus scope.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene l'elemento con lo stato attivo logico all'interno dell'ambito specificato lo stato attivo.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Input.FocusManager.FocusedElement%2A> is the element which has logical focus for a specific focus scope.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Windows.Input.FocusManager.FocusedElement%2A>è l'elemento che ha lo stato attivo logico per un ambito specifico dello stato attivo.</xref:System.Windows.Input.FocusManager.FocusedElement%2A>

trans-unit.source: This object may or may not have keyboard focus.
trans-unit.target: Questo oggetto può non avere stato attivo della tastiera o.

trans-unit.source: Keyboard focus refers to the element that receives keyboard input.
trans-unit.target: Lo stato attivo fa riferimento all'elemento che riceve l'input da tastiera.

trans-unit.source: For more information on focus, keyboard focus, and logical focus, see the [Input Overview](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Per ulteriori informazioni sullo stato attivo, lo stato attivo e lo stato attivo logico, vedere il [Input Overview](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: If `element` is not a focus scope, this method will return `null`.
trans-unit.target: Se `element` non è un ambito attivo, questo metodo restituirà `null`.

trans-unit.source: Use <xref:System.Windows.Input.FocusManager.SetFocusedElement%2A>, to specify the element with logical focus within a specified focus scope.
trans-unit.target: Utilizzare <xref:System.Windows.Input.FocusManager.SetFocusedElement%2A>per specificare l'elemento con lo stato attivo logico in un ambito attivo specificato.</xref:System.Windows.Input.FocusManager.SetFocusedElement%2A>

trans-unit.source: The element with logical focus in the specified focus scope.
trans-unit.target: L'elemento con lo stato attivo logico nell'ambito specificato lo stato attivo.

trans-unit.source: The element in the specified focus scope with logical focus.
trans-unit.target: L'elemento in un ambito attivo specificato con lo stato attivo logico.

trans-unit.source: element is .
trans-unit.target: elementis .

trans-unit.source: Determines the closest ancestor of the specified element that has <xref:System.Windows.Input.FocusManager.IsFocusScope*> set to <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Determina il predecessore più vicino dell'elemento specificato con <xref:System.Windows.Input.FocusManager.IsFocusScope*>impostato su <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>.</xref:System.Windows.Input.FocusManager.IsFocusScope*>

trans-unit.source: The default value of <xref:System.Windows.Input.FocusManager.IsFocusScope%2A> on a <xref:System.Windows.Window>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Menu>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolBar>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu> is `true`.
trans-unit.target: Il valore predefinito di <xref:System.Windows.Input.FocusManager.IsFocusScope%2A>su un <xref:System.Windows.Window>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Menu>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolBar>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu>è `true`.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolBar> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Menu> </xref:System.Windows.Window> </xref:System.Windows.Input.FocusManager.IsFocusScope%2A>

trans-unit.source: A focus scope is a container element that keeps track of the <xref:System.Windows.Input.FocusManager.FocusedElement%2A?displayProperty=fullName> within its scope.
trans-unit.target: Un ambito attivo è un elemento contenitore che tiene traccia del <xref:System.Windows.Input.FocusManager.FocusedElement%2A?displayProperty=fullName>all'interno dell'ambito.</xref:System.Windows.Input.FocusManager.FocusedElement%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: By default, the <xref:System.Windows.Window> class is a focus scope as are the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Menu>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu>, and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolBar> classes.
trans-unit.target: Per impostazione predefinita, la <xref:System.Windows.Window>classe è un ambito attivo, come il <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Menu>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu>, e <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolBar>classi.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolBar> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Menu> </xref:System.Windows.Window>

trans-unit.source: An element which is a focus scope has <xref:System.Windows.Input.FocusManager.IsFocusScope%2A> set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: È un elemento che è un ambito attivo <xref:System.Windows.Input.FocusManager.IsFocusScope%2A>impostato su `true`.</xref:System.Windows.Input.FocusManager.IsFocusScope%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information on focus, keyboard focus, and logical focus, see the [Input Overview](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Per ulteriori informazioni sullo stato attivo, lo stato attivo e lo stato attivo logico, vedere il [Input Overview](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: The element to get the closest focus scope for.
trans-unit.target: Elemento da ottenere l'ambito dello stato attivo più vicino.

trans-unit.source: The focus scope for the specified element.
trans-unit.target: Ambito dello stato attivo per l'elemento specificato.

trans-unit.source: element is .
trans-unit.target: elementis .

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the specified <xref href="System.Windows.DependencyObject"></xref> is a focus scope.
trans-unit.target: Determina se l'oggetto specificato <xref href="System.Windows.DependencyObject"> </xref> è un ambito attivo.

trans-unit.source: A focus scope is a container element that keeps track of the <xref:System.Windows.Input.FocusManager.FocusedElement%2A?displayProperty=fullName> within its scope.
trans-unit.target: Un ambito attivo è un elemento contenitore che tiene traccia del <xref:System.Windows.Input.FocusManager.FocusedElement%2A?displayProperty=fullName>all'interno dell'ambito.</xref:System.Windows.Input.FocusManager.FocusedElement%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: By default, the <xref:System.Windows.Window> class is a focus scope as are the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Menu>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu>, and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolBar> classes.
trans-unit.target: Per impostazione predefinita, la <xref:System.Windows.Window>classe è un ambito attivo, come il <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Menu>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu>, e <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolBar>classi.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolBar> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Menu> </xref:System.Windows.Window>

trans-unit.target: È un elemento che è un ambito attivo <xref:System.Windows.Input.FocusManager.IsFocusScope%2A>impostato su `true`.</xref:System.Windows.Input.FocusManager.IsFocusScope%2A>

trans-unit.target: Per ulteriori informazioni sullo stato attivo, lo stato attivo e lo stato attivo logico, vedere il [Input Overview](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: The element from which to read the attached property.
trans-unit.target: L'elemento da cui leggere la proprietà associata.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if <xref:System.Windows.Input.FocusManager.IsFocusScope*> is set to <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> on the specified element; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se <xref:System.Windows.Input.FocusManager.IsFocusScope*>è impostato su <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref> nell'elemento specificato; in caso contrario, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.</xref:System.Windows.Input.FocusManager.IsFocusScope*>

trans-unit.target: Identifica il <xref:System.Windows.Input.FocusManager.GotFocus>evento associato.</xref:System.Windows.Input.FocusManager.GotFocus>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Da aggiungere.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Input.FocusManager.IsFocusScope*> attached property.
trans-unit.target: Identifica la <xref:System.Windows.Input.FocusManager.IsFocusScope*>proprietà associata.</xref:System.Windows.Input.FocusManager.IsFocusScope*>

trans-unit.source: The default value of <xref:System.Windows.Input.FocusManager.IsFocusScope%2A> on a <xref:System.Windows.Window>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Menu>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolBar>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu> is `true`.
trans-unit.target: Il valore predefinito di <xref:System.Windows.Input.FocusManager.IsFocusScope%2A>su un <xref:System.Windows.Window>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Menu>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolBar>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu>è `true`.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolBar> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Menu> </xref:System.Windows.Window> </xref:System.Windows.Input.FocusManager.IsFocusScope%2A>

trans-unit.source: A focus scope is a container element that keeps track of the <xref:System.Windows.Input.FocusManager.FocusedElement%2A?displayProperty=fullName> within its scope.
trans-unit.target: Un ambito attivo è un elemento contenitore che tiene traccia del <xref:System.Windows.Input.FocusManager.FocusedElement%2A?displayProperty=fullName>all'interno dell'ambito.</xref:System.Windows.Input.FocusManager.FocusedElement%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: By default, the <xref:System.Windows.Window> class is a focus scope as are the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Menu>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu>, and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolBar> classes.
trans-unit.target: Per impostazione predefinita, la <xref:System.Windows.Window>classe è un ambito attivo, come il <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Menu>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu>, e <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolBar>classi.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolBar> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Menu> </xref:System.Windows.Window>

trans-unit.target: È un elemento che è un ambito attivo <xref:System.Windows.Input.FocusManager.IsFocusScope%2A>impostato su `true`.</xref:System.Windows.Input.FocusManager.IsFocusScope%2A>

trans-unit.target: Per ulteriori informazioni sullo stato attivo, lo stato attivo e lo stato attivo logico, vedere il [Input Overview](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Da aggiungere.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Input.FocusManager.LostFocus> attached event.
trans-unit.target: Identifica il <xref:System.Windows.Input.FocusManager.LostFocus>evento associato.</xref:System.Windows.Input.FocusManager.LostFocus>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Da aggiungere.

trans-unit.source: Removes a handler for the <xref:System.Windows.Input.FocusManager.GotFocus> attached event.
trans-unit.target: Rimuove un gestore per il <xref:System.Windows.Input.FocusManager.GotFocus>evento associato.</xref:System.Windows.Input.FocusManager.GotFocus>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement"></xref> or <xref href="System.Windows.ContentElement"></xref> that listens to this event.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement"> </xref> o <xref href="System.Windows.ContentElement"> </xref> in ascolto su questo evento.

trans-unit.source: The event handler to be removed.
trans-unit.target: Il gestore eventi da rimuovere.

trans-unit.source: Removes a handler for the <xref:System.Windows.Input.FocusManager.LostFocus> attached event.
trans-unit.target: Rimuove un gestore per il <xref:System.Windows.Input.FocusManager.LostFocus>evento associato.</xref:System.Windows.Input.FocusManager.LostFocus>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement"></xref> or <xref href="System.Windows.ContentElement"></xref> that listens to this event.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement"> </xref> o <xref href="System.Windows.ContentElement"> </xref> in ascolto su questo evento.

trans-unit.source: The event handler to be removed.
trans-unit.target: Il gestore eventi da rimuovere.

trans-unit.source: Sets logical focus on the specified element.
trans-unit.target: Imposta logico lo stato attivo sull'elemento specificato.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Input.FocusManager.FocusedElement%2A> is the element which has logical focus for the specific focus scope.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Windows.Input.FocusManager.FocusedElement%2A>è l'elemento che ha lo stato attivo logico per l'ambito specifico.</xref:System.Windows.Input.FocusManager.FocusedElement%2A>

trans-unit.source: This object may or may not have keyboard focus.
trans-unit.target: Questo oggetto può non avere stato attivo della tastiera o.

trans-unit.source: Keyboard focus refers to the element that receives keyboard input.
trans-unit.target: Lo stato attivo fa riferimento all'elemento che riceve l'input da tastiera.

trans-unit.source: For more information on focus, keyboard focus, and logical focus, see the [Input Overview](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Per ulteriori informazioni sullo stato attivo, lo stato attivo e lo stato attivo logico, vedere il [Input Overview](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: It is possible to specify a focus scope that is an ancestor of the focus scope the element is in.
trans-unit.target: È possibile specificare un ambito che è un predecessore dell'ambito lo stato attivo per che l'elemento è incluso.

trans-unit.source: For example, if a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.StackPanel> is a focus scope and its parent <xref:System.Windows.Window> is a focus scope, a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBox> child of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.StackPanel> could specify the <xref:System.Windows.Window> as the focus scope when calling SetFocusedElement.
trans-unit.target: Ad esempio, se un <xref:System.Windows.Controls.StackPanel>è un ambito attivo e il relativo elemento padre <xref:System.Windows.Window>è un ambito e lo stato attivo un <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBox>figlio il <xref:System.Windows.Controls.StackPanel>possibile specificare il <xref:System.Windows.Window>come ambito lo stato attivo quando si chiama SetFocusedElement.</xref:System.Windows.Window> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.StackPanel> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBox> </xref:System.Windows.Window> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.StackPanel>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBox> is then <xref:System.Windows.Input.FocusManager.FocusedElement%2A> for both the <xref:System.Windows.Window> focus scope and the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.StackPanel> focus scope.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBox>viene quindi <xref:System.Windows.Input.FocusManager.FocusedElement%2A>per entrambi i <xref:System.Windows.Window>ambito dello stato attivo e <xref:System.Windows.Controls.StackPanel>ambito dello stato attivo.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.StackPanel> </xref:System.Windows.Window> </xref:System.Windows.Input.FocusManager.FocusedElement%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBox>

trans-unit.source: SetFocusedElement will give the specified element logical focus in the specified focus scope and will attempt to give the element keyboard focus.
trans-unit.target: SetFocusedElement assegnerà lo stato attivo logico di un elemento specificato nell'ambito specificato lo stato attivo e tenterà di assegnare lo stato attivo della tastiera di elemento.

trans-unit.source: The focus scope in which to make the specified element the <xref:System.Windows.Input.FocusManager.FocusedElement*>.
trans-unit.target: L'ambito dello stato attivo in cui si desidera rendere l'elemento specificato <xref:System.Windows.Input.FocusManager.FocusedElement*>.</xref:System.Windows.Input.FocusManager.FocusedElement*>

trans-unit.source: The element to give logical focus to.
trans-unit.target: Elemento a cui assegnare lo stato attivo logico.

trans-unit.source: Sets the specified <xref href="System.Windows.DependencyObject"></xref> as a focus scope.
trans-unit.target: Imposta l'oggetto specificato <xref href="System.Windows.DependencyObject"> </xref> come ambito lo stato attivo.

trans-unit.source: A focus scope is a container element that keeps track of the <xref:System.Windows.Input.FocusManager.FocusedElement%2A?displayProperty=fullName> within its scope.
trans-unit.target: Un ambito attivo è un elemento contenitore che tiene traccia del <xref:System.Windows.Input.FocusManager.FocusedElement%2A?displayProperty=fullName>all'interno dell'ambito.</xref:System.Windows.Input.FocusManager.FocusedElement%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: By default, the <xref:System.Windows.Window> class is a focus scope as are the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Menu>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu>, and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolBar> classes.
trans-unit.target: Per impostazione predefinita, la <xref:System.Windows.Window>classe è un ambito attivo, come il <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Menu>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu>, e <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolBar>classi.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolBar> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Menu> </xref:System.Windows.Window>

trans-unit.source: An element which is a focus scope has <xref:System.Windows.Input.FocusManager.IsFocusScope%2A> set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: È un elemento che è un ambito attivo <xref:System.Windows.Input.FocusManager.IsFocusScope%2A>impostato su `true`.</xref:System.Windows.Input.FocusManager.IsFocusScope%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information on focus, keyboard focus, and logical focus, see the [Input Overview](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Per ulteriori informazioni sullo stato attivo, lo stato attivo e lo stato attivo logico, vedere il [Input Overview](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: The element to make a focus scope.
trans-unit.target: L'elemento per rendere un ambito attivo.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if `element` is a focus scope; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se `element` un ambito dello stato attivo; in caso contrario, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.
